comments.body: Intersting.  I didn't know that icons were part of input.  Makes some sense I guess.  Certainly for a material.Input.
Input is part of the material package.  We name it something else if that's confusing.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@          new Input(key: _kPhoneKey, icon: 'communication/phone', hintText: 'Phone'),
          new Input(key: _kEmailKey, icon: 'communication/email', hintText: 'Email'),
          new Input(key: _kAddressKey, icon: 'maps/place', hintText: 'Address'),
          new Input(key: _kRingtoneKey, icon: 'av/volume_up', hintText: 'Ringtone'),
          new Input(key: _kNoteKey, icon: 'content/add', hintText: 'Add note'),
